meanings.sent1: I need to redecide on my outfit for the party.
meanings.sent2: After much thought, she decided to redecide on her career path.
meanings.sent3: Let's redecide on the movie we want to watch; I keep changing my mind!
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed to redecide their shape as the wind shifted.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to redecide their answers after reviewing the lesson.

meanings.sent1: He will redecide his vacation plans due to the unexpected weather forecast.
meanings.sent2: She had to redecide her budget after unexpected expenses arose.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to redecide its nap spot every few minutes.
meanings.sent4: The company had to redecide its marketing strategy after the competitor's new product launch.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to redecide the menu for the event at the last minute.
